pages.title: The Claim Trader
pages.text: There is one Claim Trader at the spawn location.

pages.title: Infos
pages.text: $(o)You can buy extra claims.$()$(br2)Starting at $(l)20 Silver$() per Claim.$(br2)The price increases with every purchased claim.$(br2)$(l)Before you claim a land, make sure you give your neighbors enough room to expand.
